features: ❤Set OF 2❤ For All Skin Types. Gentle on Sensitive Skin, 3.5 Oz Ea.
❤PREMIUM FORMULA❤ Made Exclusively with Natural Goat's Milk which can CLEAN, EXFOLIATE, BALANCE, SOFTEN AND DETOXIFY SKIN. No sulfates, parabens, or phthalates. Cruelty-free and vegan.
❤INTENSELY MOISTURIZING❤ Contains 10x more moisturizers than ordinary bar soap for softer, smoother, more radiant-looking skin. Give you a pampered spa-like experience every time you use it.

❤How to use❤ 1. Wet skin and lather soap; 2. Massage into skin in a gentle, circular motion; 3. Leave on for 10-30 seconds; 4. Rinse clean thoroughly; 5. Follow your skincare routine to lock in hydration.
❤PERFECT AS GIFTS❤ Mother's Day, Valentine's Day, Birthday, and Holidays. For Women, Men, Teens, and Children.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PREMIUM FORMULA Made EXCLUSIVELY with Sea Salt and Natural Goat's Milk which can CLEAN, EXFOLIATE, BALANCE, SOFTEN AND DETOXIFY SKIN. What makes Sea Salt special? Sea Salt is loaded with minerals, which is drawing, purifying and amazing for fighting acne. It helps to restore the skin's natural oil balance, if you get pimples, you should try sea salt bars, it might help to cleanse all of that away.

INTENSELY MOISTURIZING It is especially suitable for those with sensitive skin because of its gentle moisturizing and nourishing qualities. The long lasting bars rinse off clean and don't leave soap residue behind. Give you a pampered spa-like experience every time you use.
GIVE A BOOST TO YOUR SKINCARE ROUTINE
Suitable for the Crowd Sea Salt Soap is suited for anyone looking for a more delicate, cleansing soap bar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get clean, smell great and enjoy lather!
reviews.reviewText: I've used this soap for a few months and feel like I can give a fair review now. I used it to wash my face twice a day, and I do have to say this sea salt soap totally cleared up my face and was so gentle. It lathers so creamy and easy to wash. I feel my toner is better absorbed after using this soap. Every day I wake up in the morning, my face is still moist. Sometimes my wife used this soap after removing the makeup. She feels like this soap clear up the residue makeup very well. I highly recommend this soap! It's really nice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Creamiest soap I've ever used!
reviews.reviewText: I received my soap today and just finished using it. It is so creamy and made wonderful suds on my face. After drying my face, it didn't feel like there was residue left on my face,,it all rinsed off and my face feels so clean! I can't wait to see if my skin will improve, because it has been awful lately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Well, Ive used the Dead sea warehouse brand for a good time. I used to buy it at Sprouts. This popped up in amazon so it seemed good all because of the skin comparison they advertised.By the second time I used I realized I itch all over. Not bad...but I get some annoying little pricks...Annoying right!? So I helped that with a spray bottle alcohol and some eucalyptus/peppermint oil. DoneMy face did clear up. It wasnt bad but I was getting small dark spots.I also am sensitive down there when it comes to soap. No oil no fragrance can pass near that area☺️.This one did good just like the Dead sea warehouse brand. Definitely adding this to my pile of options.Hope this review helps.Uh yeah shipping was find...blah

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Update: Nice scent, soap does not dry out skin it take about 4 to 5 wks before you see a difference
reviews.reviewText: Update: The soap has a nice scent and it doesn’t dry your skin like some soaps on market. Originally, I stated that the soap did not show a drastic difference after 3 weeks and that was true. However, after 5 weeks my skin started to have a much smoother appearance. My pores are not as pronounced and I use the soap in the mesh sack to help with exfoliation. I will buy it again. Just be prepared to wait for at least 5 weeks to see a difference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Got for face soap, did not disappoint. Wet your face, rub the soap on skin then lather. Makes a very creamy lather, smells nice, and leaves skin clean but not dry or stripped, great for oily, combination and older skin. Love the ingredients. I keep it on a wood soap dish, and hint, you can cut it, so just use half and the save the rest for another time, keeps better, lasts longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Got for dry skin under feet, sea salt soap usually does a miracle on it, this soap 2 boxes, each box has in 2 soaps, no help or results. The packaging is very nice tho but the soaps are tiny compared to the 3 layers of packaging size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sea salt
reviews.reviewText: I sell this product alot and to my customers they love it very much I recommend this product for purchasing
